column1: **!help** - Bring up a list of commands
**!format** - The way you should format the timesheet entries
**!time** - Find the number of hours you have been on patrol
**!month** - duty hours for the current month
**!sync** - sync the database with all entries in the channel
**!setCallsign** <@user> <callsign>- set the callsign of a specific user in the channel in the form X-000
**!makeAdmin** <@user> - make a user an admin of the bot
**!removeAdmin** <@user> - remove admin powers from a specific user
**!report** *<month/week/fortnightyear/all>* - generate a csv file of duty hours of all police officers
